quote_first: Bill Russell left the office at
quote_last: that evening, and never entered the building again.
title: Sons of Fortune
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: He left the dining room and went downstairs to the wine cellar. A single bulb lit a room that had once stored filing cabinets full of archives. Since Giles’s arrival, they had been replaced by wine racks.
title: The Sins of the Father
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: The dusk was settling majestically over Tokyo, after a rare smogless day. The view was particularly inspiring from the fifty-fifth-floor penthouse of the granite-clad Mino Industries building.
title: Project Daedalus
author: Thomas Hoover

quote_last: Noreen brings another whole tray that’s dinner, we can have dinner at five something or six something or even seven something, Ma says.
title: Room
author: Emma Donoghue
